startWinInfoText1:
Thank you for choosing CSNova!

CSNova is an open-source project designed to help you organize and manage your creative writing projects.
You can customize the program to fit your workflow. Additionally, CSNova has a clear philosophy:
'You don't have to learn how the program works - the program should understand how you want to work.'

Before you get started, you can make some basic settings:

- Choose your preferred language.
- Choose a theme for CSNova to use.
startWinInfoText2:
You can also change these and other settings later in the settings.

Once you've made your selections - and are satisfied - click Save
You can restore the default settings by clicking Reset.
Or simply click Next to continue.
btn_save_hint: Here you can save the current settings.
btn_reset_hint: Here you can reset the settings to the default settings.
btn_next_hint: Here you can proceed to the next step.
